name: Solitary Blade
description:
An improved version of this.

The theme of the game jam this game initially published to is "Take one, leave the rest". I decided to take on a mechanic that allows you to only attack 1 enemy at a time. Have fun! (Although I don't really find this fun, only a slightly interesting mechanic lol). I appreciate any kind of feedback to help me improve this game :D(critics are absolutely fine as long as you give me things to improve). How To Play?
  • AD - Move Left and Right
  • Left Click - If an enemy is inside your attack range, activate the TIME PAUSER skill. Time stops for 2 seconds (wait what) and you click your mouse as many times as possible for this duration. After that, the enemy takes that amount of damage.
